entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 7:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 5.3°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
